text:
hey guys so today I am having a meal with my 
friends my high school friends for the very

last time before I leave and we are at a southern 
food restaurant we love southern food here the

great thing about being in Bangkok is it's such 
a central place that any region of cuisine can be

found in Bangkok and southern food has become 
very popular in the recent years so the first

items to arrive this is condom themed sort of 
a set so kinome davis's rice noodles here and

this set comes with three different sauces so you 
can think of this as sort of our version of pasta

so this one is a little sweet this one has a 
coconut turmeric curry this one is something

that is incredibly spicy and the set also comes 
with a ton vegetables and pickles pickled mustard

greens to sort of you know balance the richness 
a little bit tons of vegetables southern food

is always known for having tons of vegetables 
this one here is how yam again I always order

this whenever I'm having southern food and it's 
a rice salad and got some red rice and homologue

cucumber toasted coconut dried shrimp a ton of 
different things this is a sour southern curry

so it's gang we literally yellow curry the 
broth is made yellow with turmeric and these

little balls is really interesting it's not a 
barbecue and they're fish eggs here it is type

barrio view it's a little creamy but it's mostly 
just kind of chewy and starchy if you didn't tell

me I would think that this is some sort of a 
sticky rice ball you know it's got that really

nice texture taste nothing no fishiness at all 
the curry is spicy but really good flavor if you

get a chance give it a try so this one is also 
a classic in turmeric and deep fried simple so

these are actually complementary the restaurant 
this gave control of a southern variety of peanuts

I'm calling them peanuts they're probably 
not absolutely peanuts so they taste kind

of like peanuts with a southern variety and 
inside is like that and they've been boiled

super creamy and it does have that peanut 
flavor it's really nice actually it's a nice

sort of snack here is the southern coconut soup 
so the coconut soup with a southern vegetable all

packed food I have no idea what it's called in 
English with hearts of palm these crunchy nutty

things here and since rim all right here's 
the soup it's actually really well balanced

it doesn't it's not spicy it's creamy it's 
comforting it doesn't have that sharp normal

flavor of of a Thai soup like a thumb yum so 
a really nice dish to wash everything down

and for dessert we've got this what's called lob 
cheong I've talked about this a couple of times

it's basically rice noodles but the green color 
comes from pandan leaf and surfed in a coconut

palm sugar syrup super classic very easy to find 
and very very refreshing way to finish a meal
